abstract: Disc 1: Life story (prod/dir Richard Dale)--An everyday miracle (prod/dir Andrew Thompson)--First steps (prod/dir Andrew Thompson)--Raging teens (prod. Peter Georgi, dir. Richard Dale). Disc 2: Brain power (prod/dir Andrew Thompson)--As time goes by (prod/dir John Groom)--The End of life (prod/dir Christopher Spencer)
description: Presented by Doctor and scientist Professor Lord Robert Winston, this double dvd set contains the complete series of the "Human body" (1998), from birth (Life story), to death (The End of life), and features ground breaking technology that takes the viewer on a thorough exploration of the human body. Each episode is also available on vhs. See these entries for an episode breakdown.
